Room.Name: Necropolis Path
Room.ShortDescription: You are circling the Necropolis on a well tended path.
Room.LongDescription: A gravel path and a grass covered walkway converge at this point on the grounds. To the northwest there is one of several entrances to the commoners' cemetery. Inside that area are a great many simple headstones and inset plaques, all on a well tended grassy hill. A crew of gardners and a few grave diggers are taking a break under a tree, eating something odd.
